projects.title: Smart Sense AI
projects.description: Smart Sense AI is an advanced AI-powered communication assistant designed to help students and professionals generate excuses, apologies, professional emails, letters, medical explanations, and personalized learning roadmaps. Built with React + FastAPI + Gemini 1.5 Pro, the system delivers fast, context-aware, human-like responses with customizable tones.
